name: @cf/facebook/bart-large-cnn
description: BART is a transformer encoder-encoder (seq2seq) model with a bidirectional (BERT-like) encoder and an autoregressive (GPT-like) decoder. You can use this model for text summarization.

task.name: Summarization
task.description: Summarization is the task of producing a shorter version of a document while preserving its important information. Some models can extract text from the original input, while other models can generate entirely new text.

input_text.description: The text that you want the model to summarize

max_length.description: The maximum length of the generated summary in tokens

summary.description: The summarized version of the input text
